title: CivicPress Legal-Register Module Schema Extension
description: JSON Schema extension for legal-register module. This schema extends base record types (bylaw, ordinance, policy, proclamation, resolution) with legal-specific validation rules. These record types are core types, but this module adds legal-specific requirements and validations.

document_number.description: Official document number (e.g., BYL-2024-001, ORD-15-42). Recommended for all legal documents.

legal_authority.description: Legal authority or statute governing the document (e.g., 'Municipal Act, Section 15')

jurisdiction.description: Jurisdictional level of the legal document

language.description: ISO 639-1 language code (e.g., en, fr, en-CA, fr-CA)

translation_of.description: Record ID if this is a translation of another record

translations.description: Array of record IDs for translated versions of this document

supersedes.description: Array of record IDs this document replaces

superseded_by.description: Record ID of document that replaces this (null if current)

approval_date.description: ISO 8601 date when the document was approved

effective_date.description: ISO 8601 date when the document becomes effective

expiry_date.description: ISO 8601 date when the document expires (null if permanent)

review_date.description: ISO 8601 date when the document should be reviewed

reviewed_by.description: Username or role of who reviewed the document

retention_schedule.description: Retention period for the record (e.g., permanent, temporary, 10 years)

public_access.description: Indicates if the record is publicly accessible

access_level.description: Specific access level of the record

publication_date.description: ISO 8601 date when the record was made publicly available

role.description: Role of the approver (e.g., clerk, mayor, council)

date.description: ISO 8601 date when the action was taken

change_history.description: Audit trail of changes made to the record

date.description: ISO 8601 date when the change was made

changes.description: Array of descriptions of what changed

document_number.description: Document number is strongly recommended for legal documents

legal_authority.description: Legal authority is recommended for legal documents

jurisdiction.description: Jurisdiction is recommended for legal documents
